title: scott.center
description: scott.center is Scott's personal website. The front-end is written in React and utilizes the PHP and MySQL backend API to retrieve users and data using the ScottIdentity token system

title: VisualOS
description: VisualOS is a x86-64 UEFI operating system that aims to remove the need for command line interfaces

title: BlueGUI
description: Java based bluetooth audio mixer for raspberry pis

title: RADConsole
description: GUI based P25 digital radio decoder and more for mobile computers
